Reviews.Title: Perfect Package
Reviews.Author: Mohammad Y. Hajjat
Reviews.Content: The package has a well round accessory set of what an amateur photographer needs. I absolutely loved the package and its price.

ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 13 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
<1> Nikon D5200 Digital SLR Camera Body (Black) + <2> Nikon 18-140mm VR DX AF-S Lens + <3> Nikon Digital SLR Camera Case +
<4> Transcend 32GB SDHC 300x Card + <5> Spare EN-EL14 Battery + <6> Precision Design DSLR300 Flash +
<7> 67mm UV Filter + <8> Precision Design ML-L3 Remote + <9> Precision Design 58" Tripod +
<10> PD SDHC Memory Card Reader + <11> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit + <12> PD 8 SD Card Memory Card Case + <13> LCD Screen Protectors
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon D5200 Digital SLR Camera Body (Black) with 18-140mm VR Lens + 32GB Card + Case + Flash + Battery + Filter + Tripod Kit
